  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112435</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112435</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Igre z baloni</string>
            <string language="en">Games with balloons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele mit Ballonen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux avec des ballons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos com balões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi con gli aerostati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια με τα μπαλόνια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos con los globos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Telesa lahko z drgnjenjem naelektrimo. Z naelektrenimi baloni lahko počnemo marsikaj.</string>
            <string language="en">How to electrify balloons, possible games that can make use of such balloons. Useful when teaching electrostatics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatika</string>
            <string language="en">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">balon</string>
            <string language="en">balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Ballone, mögliche Spiele elektrifiziert, 
die solche Ballone gebrauchen können. Nützlich, wenn 
Electrostatics unterrichtet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment électrifier des ballons, jeux possibles 
qui peuvent se servir de tels ballons. Utile en enseignant 
l'electrostatics.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como electrify balões, jogos possíveis que podem
empregar tais balões. Útil ao ensinar o electrostatics.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come electrify gli aerostati, giochi possibili che
possono usare tali aerostati. Utile quando insegnano 
electrostatics.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να ηλεκτρίσει τα μπαλόνια, πιθανά παιχνίδια που 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν τέτοια μπαλόνια. Χρήσιμος κατά 
το διδασκαλία electrostatics.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo electrify los globos, juegos posibles que 
pueden hacer uso tales globos. Útil al enseñar 
electrostática.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ballon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">balão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aerostato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπαλόνι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electrostática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">globo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
